Never miss a deal again with Pricy
-------------
Pricy Extension directly integrates into amazon. When you are watching a product it displayed just below the price tag. 
-------------
Never Overpay again
-------------
Pricy will always tell you when the price of the product is high and if itâ€™s worth waiting for a better price.

Based on the price history, Pricy calculates the probable future price for a product.
-------------
Check the Price History
-------------
Just hover over, and Pricy will show you how the price changed in the past so you can easily find trends and get ready for the big drop.
-------------
Instant Price Drop Notifications
-------------
Set a price that you would pay for the product. Pricy will monitor the price of the product and send you a notification as soon as it drops below your defined price.

Please note, Pricy is currently only available for Amazon.com. 
Support for other amazon sites coming soon.
